page.title: 01Hinton St George and Area
page.content: There are not very many facilities in Hinton. There is a recreation ground, a pub, a postoffice, a bus service, a church and a village hall. People mainly travel outside the village to go to work because there's not much work in Hinton. The shop is a family business as well as the Post Office and the pub only employs a few people. There is one farm in the village called Browns' Farm. There is a good education and small classes in the village school. Small schools care about you and we care for each other. People don't pollute the countryside by dropping litter. There's no vandalism in Hinton because everybody knows everybody and someone will soon find out. Around Hinton is beautiful open countryside with fields, woods, animals and footpaths. People take care of Hinton St George.
